title: 4 tips to steam up your sex life this holiday season
text:
Wondering what to do this holiday season with all your days off from work? How about having lots and lots of glorious sex with your man? Sounds good, doesn’t it? We’ve rounded up four hot ways to make holiday sex steamier. Happy holidays!



Flirt all the way

Holidays mean spending time with family and friends over dinners, parties, and the whole she bang. Flirting with your SO with people around can be really fun and exciting. Steal longing glances, play footsie under the table, graze your fingers lightly over his arm… just flirt and end the day with a hot sex session in bed.



Gift him an erotic massage

Holidays are also about gifts and nothing can beat the power of an erotic massage. Have your man lie down in bed and let your fingers roam freely all over him, kneading his muscles sensuously. Add to the magic with some aromatic massage oils and set the stage with scented candles.



Act out your fantasies

Play out the naughty girl fantasy with your beau this Christmas. Dress up in your sexiest red outfit with a Santa hat and unleash your inner sex goddess. And if you indeed have been a naughty, naughty girl, you can look forward to your partner spanking you.



Try out mindful sex

You will probably have lots of free time on hand during the holidays, so spend some quality time cosying up to your partner. Sex doesn’t always have to be wild and rushed to be hot; slow, sensual sex is awesome, too, and should be right up there in every couple’s to-do list.
